name: Cells Assembled
description:
Recruit other cells to kill the bad cell. Together you can work together and get rid of the virus. 

Instructions:

W A S D to move, Mouse to Look Around, "R" to recruit other cells by getting near them, and Space to Attack viruses. 

Credits:

3d moddeling: RGBResist

Music: https://619section.itch.io/

Programming: http://losthuman.itch.io/
